Portfolio

A Little Bit About Me

Hey, my name is Gemma Ernst and I am an Australian born creative now based in Bali. I've been in the industry for 5 and a half years, mostly working with agencies, but truth be told...I'm all about the independant innovators and entrepenuers! I am all for helping start ups find their feet within the digital world and providing them with the means to leverage themselves into the industry without spending a small fortune whilst doing so. Be it web design, content marketing, or managing your social media channels, I’ll help you focus in on the areas that can make a real difference to you and your business. To get to the true personality of your brand, I work with you not without you .

Services

Social Media Management

Social media can be overwhelming at the best of times; between posting, liking, keeping up with DMs and comments...it's easy to let your Instagram account slip into the dark when you've got a million other business related things going on in your brain. This is where I come in! I will help you de-clutter your mind, and will take all of the stress of growing and managing your social media accounts, leaving you to deal with the forefront of your business.

Web Design

I create customisable templates that not only look good but are also user friendly and affordable. I want you to be as involved and as in control of your website as possible, which is why I will design and build you the website of your dreams, that you are able to edit and update yourself!

Content Creation

I offer content creation and have worked with a number of reputable brands to create engaging content for your social media feeds.From food photography to product and lifestyle shoots, I will work with you to create images that will flow seamlessly with your brand and your social media channels..
